epamanak nowa, meya aakarshaniya, nihathamani charithaya, sinhala chithrapatayaka pradhana charithaya rangapa athara, awasanawakata men eki dala seya pata winasha wima nisa ema chithrapataya narambaannata apata wasanawan nolabini. 1930 aga bhagaya wana wita wadidura adhyapanaya sandaha engalanthaya bala giya en. em. landan sarasawiyen, aarthika widyawa pilibanda pi. ech. di. saha di. as. si yana aacharya upadhi dekak dina gaththe ya.

pinwathni, buduhamuduruwo meyin wadale asin, kanin, nasayen, diwin, sharirayen ha manasin kiyana sadorin rupa, shabda, gandha, rasa, sparsha, dhamma kiyana me aramunu thamanta pi්raya manapadi washayen ganimen thrushnawa upadina bawath ema thrushnawa nisa ohuta duk upadina bawath hethupala dharmayayi.

nuwara eliya disthrikkaye, walapane adhyapana kalapaye ushkara pasalaka lamunta pariganaka adhyapanayata atha hitha denna kamathi ayata apith ekka ekwenna kiyala arayum karanawa.
